description.text: Reach Level 10 in Naturecraft. Can smoke mushrooms by offhanding them and sneaking, while having atleast 4XP levels. Red 50% chance of Poison or Regeneration, Brown 50% chance of Nausia or Night Vision, Crimson 50% chance of Wither or Fire Resist, Warped 50% chance of Levetation or Feather Fall.
